rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C118971

definition: A grouping of observations within the Clinical Classification domain.
name: Category of Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade (Coronary Artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHBLI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9).
terms.preferredTerm: Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Coronary Thrombus TIMI Grade (TIMI Definitions for Commonly Used Terms in Clinical Trials. Available at http://www.timi.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/TIMI-Definitions.pdf. Accessed November 30, 2013).
terms.preferredTerm: Coronary Thrombus TIMI Grade Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Grade (Cutlip DE, Windecker S, Mehran R, et al. Clinical End Points in Coronary Stent Trials : A Case for Standardized Definitions. Circulation. 2007;115:2344-2351).
terms.preferredTerm: Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Grade Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Timing (Cutlip DE, Windecker S, Mehran R, et al. Clinical End Points in Coronary Stent Trials : A Case for Standardized Definitions. Circulation. 2007;115:2344-2351).
terms.preferredTerm: Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Timing Clinical Classification
